item.description:

item.title: Our first pitch day - Digital Chains
item.description:
Our first pitch day - Digital Chains

Today was a landmark in the evolution of our startup, Mamoru. Three months after we entered the Nexuslab virtual blockchain bootcamp, we had to put ourselves on the line and pitch in front of an audience of investors and blockchain enthusiasts at the Nexuslab Blockchain Festival in Zurich.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Trend Line Resistance Intact - NEWSBTC

item.title: Social network Steemit distributes $1.3 million in first cryptocurrency payout to users
item.description:
Social network Steemit distributes $1.3 million in first cryptocurrency payout to users

Steemit, a blockchain-powered decentralized social network, distributed Monday $1.3 million in cryptocurrency to users of the site, who are paid for posting and voting on content. The payout is the...

item.title: Brexit Turns Bitcoin Into an Unlikely Haven Currency: Chart
item.description:
Brexit Turns Bitcoin Into an Unlikely Haven Currency: Chart

While bitcoin is not exactly regarded as stable - it's bounced around between $2 and $1,137 over the past five years - it's become an unlikely haven for currency investors in the aftermath of Brexit. On Tuesday, the 10-day historical volatility of bitcoin dropped below the pound's.

item.title: U.S. Department of Health Calls for Blockchain Research
item.description:
U.S. Department of Health Calls for Blockchain Research

The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) just put out a call for White Papers that address the utilization of blockchain in healthcare. Let's see what happens. HHS recently offered a press release [PDF] that asked for registrants to register and respond to the prompt, "Blockchain and Its Emerging Role in Healthcare and Health-related Research."

item.title: No Man's Sky Website Accepts Bitcoin Payments For Pre-orders
item.description:
No Man's Sky Website Accepts Bitcoin Payments For Pre-orders

The gaming industry is slowly starting to appreciate the value Bitcoin can bring to the table. No Man's Sky, an exploration game many people are excited about, can be pre-ordered with Bitcoin. Quite an interesting concept for a game that will be coming to both PS4 and PC in a few weeks from now.

item.title: CryptXXX Developers Remove Support For Victims With Bitcoin Payment Problems
item.description:
CryptXXX Developers Remove Support For Victims With Bitcoin Payment Problems

The cat and mouse game between Bitcoin ransomware developers and security researchers continues. The CryptXXX developers have come up with another improvement to their malware. A change in ransom note may not be significant, but the change in Tor payment site is rather interesting.
